sections.title: Description
sections.raw_content: Hides the menu bar in the selected window. No menu items can be selected when the menu bar is hidden. (Menu item shortcuts are ignored while the menu bar is hidden.)
sections.mdown_content: Hides the menu bar in the selected window. No menu items can be selected when the menu bar is hidden. (Menu item shortcuts are ignored while the menu bar is hidden.)

sections.title: Status
sections.raw_content:
Exported qualified.

This means that you can only call the function by calling GUI.HideMenuBar, not by calling HideMenuBar.
sections.mdown_content:
Exported qualified.
This means that you can only call the function by calling **GUI.HideMenuBar**, not by calling **HideMenuBar**.
